```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(naniar)
```

```{r}
responses <- read_csv(here::here("SOP4777", "humansexuality_surveyresponses.csv"))
View(responses)
```
```{r}
na_strings <- c("Don't know", "N/A", "None", "Missing")

responses_df <- responses |> replace_with_na_all(condition = ~.x %in% na_strings)
View(responses_df)
```

```{r}
chisq.test(responses_df$vax_status, responses_df$VH2, correct = FALSE)
```

```{r}
  cor.test(responses_df$VH4, responses_df$VH7, method = "spearman")

```
